name: Gordian Snake
description:
GORDIAN SNAKE v0.1

// ---------------------

// CONTROLS:
// ARROW KEYS to turn
// SPACE to pause (can move while paused to play step by step)
// R to restart

// 1-9 to change colour palette
// S to save a screenshot

// ---------------------

Note: there are a few visual + mechanical bugs in this, which I may or may not get around to fixing, but that's what v0.1 is for!
